name: Shuffling Around
description:
Release 5 of Shuffling Around happened on May 13th, 2022. It was written in Inform 7.

It was originally written for IFComp 2012, but a lot of features have been added, and a lot of bugs were fixed. It placed 7th out of 28 entries.

It's a wordplay game, and hopefully you'll be able to guess the main mechanic pretty quickly.

A map and walkthrough are provided as separate files for those who don't mind spoilers.

The GitHub code is at https://github.com/andrewschultz/stale-tales-slate/tree/main/Shuffling.

It shares Inform 7 code and Python verification scripts with its sequel A Roiling Original, and their sequel is Tours Roust Torus.
